elements.label: A Bequest
elements.description: A package of peculiar papers from my correspondent's executor. I must STUDY it, using either Passion or Reason.

slots.label: Approach
slots.description: Am I a passionate individual, or a reasonable one?

elements.label: Menial Employment

elements.label: Notes on a Possible Collaborator
elements.description: My correspondent had recorded his observations of me. He believed I had 'potential'. He recorded his observations of someone else, too. With time and study, perhaps I can find that person.
